generate.sh

  • opal/stdlib/nodejs/node_modules/glob/node_modules/minimatch/node_modules/brace-expansion/test/generate.sh
  • Last modified: 2015-08-29 16:13:52 +0200

#!/usr/bin/env bash

set -e

# Bash 4.3 because of arbitrary need to pick a single standard.

if [ “${BASH_VERSINFO}” != “4” ] || [ “${BASH_VERSINFO}” != “3” ]; then

echo "this script requires bash 4.3" >&2
exit 1

fi

CDPATH= cd “$(dirname ”$0“)”

js=‘require(“./”)(process.argv).join(“ ”)'

cat cases.txt | \

while read case; do
  if [ "${case:0:1}" = "#" ]; then
    continue;
  fi;
  b="$($BASH -c 'for c in '"$case"'; do echo ["$c"]; done')"
  echo "$case"
  echo -n "$b><><><><";
done > bash-results.txt
